page.title: 07School
page.content:
Kimbolton St.James'C.E. Primary School has 70 children on roll,3 classes and 3 teachers as well as a privately run nursery group which meets each morning.Children are admitted at the beginning of the term in which they are 5 and leave at 11+ for comprehensive school. It serves 5 parishes.
A typical School Day I usually wake up and read until Mum comes in to tell me to get dressed. After breakfast Mum takes me to a friend's house till the school bus comes. After arriving at school I leave my lunch box and sit in my own special place,then the whole class goes to assembly where we sing songs and sometimes listen to a story.
